title: BBC Local Live: Greater Manchester and east Cheshire on Monday 30 January 2017 - BBC News
summary: man held on sus of murder after woman 's death in moston .
lift fire put out at manchester united 's old trafford stadium .
breast flash gmp police chief given final written warning .
up to 20 people involved in mass brawl at 'ultimate fighting event ' in trafford .

documents.title: our live coverage across the day
text: live updates from greater manchester and east cheshire have now finished for the day , but we 'll be back from 08:00 on tuesday with more of the latest news , sport , travel and weather .

documents.title: weather : cloudy with rain
text: rather cloudy tonight with rain or drizzle at times .
there will also be extensive low cloud giving hill fog for many .
turning breezier later , and this will ensure it will be a mild and frost-free night for all .

documents.title: young oldham dancer wins regional final
text: a royton dance school saw one of it 's seven-year-old dancers gain top spot as he became the north west champion in his age group .
author: Oldham Evening Chronicle

documents.title: football : track every transfer window deal
text: there 's under 24 hours left of the january transfer window and you can track every club 's dealings with this handy search tool .

manchester united manager jose mourinho has said winger ashley young is the only player who might leave before the deadline , while manchester city are said to have rejected a bid from an unnamed championship club for midfielder aaron mooy .
author: BBC Sport

documents.title: cheshire mp urges hs2 route rethink
text: a cheshire mp has told bbc radio manchester she wants hs2 bosses to rethink some of the high speed railway line 's route through the county .
it comes after an independent report - commissioned by anti-hs2 campaigners - claims a section of it is at high risk of collapse .
the findings say that because of extensive salt mining in the area , more engineering work is needed to make it safe .
this would come at a cost of an extra £ 750m , according to the mid cheshire against hs2 group .
antoinette sandbach , mp for eddisbury , says she would rather the track went up the side of the m6 .

documents.title: football : win the fa cup and dodge relegation ?
text: a debate is raging today about the integrity of the fa cup .
with so many clubs fielding weakened teams amid the financial pressures of the lucrative premier league , is there anything the football authorities can do to restore the trophy 's stock ?
well , former wigan defender matt jackson has been thinking .
now the club 's head of operations , he said : `` if you want some crazy ideas to shake up the fa cup , i 've got some .
`` how about if a premier league team won the fa cup , they could have amnesty from relegation that season ?
`` or if you win the fa cup from outside the premier league you get automatic promotion to the top flight .
those are ridiculous ideas - but they will never happen . ''
manchester city and manchester united are in the hat for the fifth round draw later
author: BBC Sport

documents.title: breast flash gmp police chief expresses 'deep regret '
text: a top police officer who exposed a breast and mocked a colleague 's `` boob job '' has expressed `` deep regret '' about what happened and said the `` responsibility for what happened is mine and mine alone '' .
assistant chief constable rebekah sutcliffe , 47 , has been allowed to keep her job following a ruling from deputy chief constable ian pilling .
she said she had been under `` significant personal and professional pressure '' and `` foolishly became drunk '' .
`` i did not mean any of the things that i said and i am dismayed that i was so unkind and unfair , '' she added .
`` i am very grateful that i have been given the opportunity to return to work . ''

documents.title: protests over donald trump 's travel ban
text: a protest is planned in manchester against donald trump 's controversial ban on immigration from seven countries .
protests have already been taking place across the us against mr trump 's executive order .
demonstrations are also planned in london , bristol , brighton , liverpool , leeds , sheffield , york , glasgow , edinburgh , cardiff and swansea .
they are due to begin at about 17:00 .

documents.title: prisoner dies after 'drug overdose ' at hmp forest bank
text: a prisoner has died and another has been taken to hospital after suspected drug overdoses at hmp forest bank in greater manchester .
author: The Guardian

documents.title: football : rooney 'eyeing china switch '
text: is wayne rooney 's premier league career finally coming to an end ?
coleen rooney has apparently given her 31-year-old england skipper husband the green light to take a £ 140m offer to play in china , the bbc sport gossip column reports .
author: BBC Sport

documents.title: mum covers homeless spikes with cushions
text: a mother incensed at the installation of anti-homeless metal spikes outside a manchester building has hit out at the owner - with cushions .
jennie platt , from prestwich , got `` a bee in her bonnet '' after reading about the spikes on marsden street in the manchester evening news .
so ms platt recruited sons george , 11 , and sam , 10 , and they `` piled down to primark '' to buy cushions to cover them .
this is not the mancunian thing , it 's not how we treat people .

text: bury sign goalkeeper murphy on loan

documents.title: weather : cloudy afternoon , mild evening
text: patches of clear sky , it 's going to be a largely cloudy afternoon , but staying dry .
cloudy skies will persist overnight , preventing a frost from forming , with outbreaks of light rain or drizzle .
more from bbc weather
author: Sara Blizzard
BBC Weather

documents.title: contact the local live team
text: remember , to share news , tip-offs , photographs or anything else , you can contact the team via email , facebook or twitter .

documents.title: breast flash police officer case was 'difficult time ' for force
text: greater manchester police 's chief constable ian hopkins said the misconduct case against top officer rebekah sutcliffe had marked `` an incredibly difficult time '' for the force .
`` when i was made aware of what happened i immediately arranged for an outside force to investigate and assistant chief constable sutcliffe was suspended from duty , '' he said .
`` acc sutcliffe has been through a completely open , transparent and independent misconduct process .
`` what is important now is that we move forward .
acc sutcliffe has by her own admission behaved in an unacceptable manner and has apologised at the outset . ''

documents.title: breast flash gmp police chief keeps job
text: here 's more on the news that a top greater manchester police officer who exposed a breast and mocked a colleague 's `` boob job '' has been allowed to keep her job .
assistant chief constable rebekah sutcliffe , 47 , called temporary supt sarah jackson `` silly , vain and frivolous '' for going under the knife .
in december a disciplinary panel ruled the greater manchester police ( gmp ) officer had breached standards of professional behaviour .
but deputy chief constable ian pilling ruled that she could keep her job .

documents.title: travel : traffic lights failure causing delays
text: a traffic lights failure is causing delays along william street in ashton-under-lyne , bbc travel reports .
author: BBC Travel

documents.title: high speed rail link 'to affect 9,000 ' across town
text: almost 9,000 people will be affected by the route of the hs2 rail line through warrington according to figures from the company responsible for planning the network .
author: Warrington Guardian

documents.title: breast flash gmp police chief given final written warning
text: a top greater manchester police officer who exposed her breast and mocked a colleague 's `` boob job '' has kept her job .
assistant chief constable rebekah sutcliffe told supt sarah jackson in a drunken tirade that her `` credibility was zero '' after she had a `` boob job '' and berated her as a `` laughing stock '' .

she then went on to pull down the front of her dress , saying : `` these are the breasts of someone who has had three children - they are ugly but i do n't feel the need to pump myself full of silicone to get self-esteem . ''

following a misconduct hearing last year , a disciplinary panel found she had committed gross misconduct , but gmp deputy chief constable ian pilling ruled earlier she would received a final written warning and could keep her job .

documents.title: dementia sufferer , 97 , hit in leigh care home burglary
text: a 97-year-old woman with dementia has been attacked during a break-in at her care home .
police said the burglary happened between 04:00 and 07:00 on sunday at bedford care home on battersby street , leigh , wigan .
the victim was treated for minor injuries `` but her injuries could have been much worse '' , police said .
cctv footage of the suspect riding a bicycle near the scene has been released by police .

documents.title: football : bolton sign burnley striker long on loan
text: bolton have signed burnley striker chris long on loan for the rest of the season , after his loan spell at fleetwood ended
author: BBC Sport

documents.title: latest headlines in greater manchester and east cheshire
text: latest headlines in greater manchester and east cheshire

documents.title: cheshire police 'sniff out ' drug drivers
text: figures released by cheshire police show there is a growing number of people driving under the influence of drugs .
inside out north west 's jacey normand has been out with officers from the force as they try to combat offenders .
author: BBC Inside Out

documents.title: travel : traffic lights failure causing delays
text: a traffic lights failure is causing delays along church street and high street in manchester city centre , bbc travel reports .
author: BBC Travel

documents.title: david beckham rubbishes 'brand beckham ' claims
text: in case you missed it , david beckham has rubbished claims that he and wife victoria stay together because of `` brand beckham '' .
the former manchester untied star was appearing on bbc radio 4 's desert island discs to celebrate the show 's 75th anniversary .
`` people have talked about 'do we stay together because it 's a brand ? '
of course not , '' he said .
author: BBC Radio 4

documents.title: mass brawl at event city prompts police appeal
text: about to 20 people are thought to have been involved in a brawl in a car park at event city in trafford .
police have launched an appeal for information following the fighting , which broke out in the early hours of sunday .
it happened following an event described as a black tie dinner featuring `` ultimate fighting championship supporter and patriotic fight fan '' conor mcgregor
three men were taken to hospital and were treated for minor injuries and have since been discharged .

documents.title: 50,000 nitrous oxide capsules found in police raid
text: police raided a house in south manchester and discovered an astonishing 50,000 nitrous oxide capsules .
author: Manchester Evening News

documents.title: latest headlines in greater manchester and east cheshire
text: latest headlines in greater manchester and east cheshire

documents.title: reaction : man utd cruise past wigan in fa cup
text: here 's all the latest reaction to manchester united 's emphatic 4-0 fa cup victory over wigan .
the red devils scored four goals in consecutive rounds of the competition for the first time since 2009 ( 4-1 v derby , 4-0 v fulham ) .
and it 's the first time the team has have scored four or more in successive rounds at old trafford since 2003 ( 4-1 v portsmouth , 6-0 v west ham ) .
author: BBC Sport

documents.title: old trafford fire 'extinguished quickly '
text: an electrical fire at manchester united 's old trafford stadium was dealt with `` quickly and effectively '' , the club has said .
a club spokesman said :
a small electrical fire was identified quickly in the sir bobby charlton stand around 07:00 today .
the fire brigade attended and the isolated incident was dealt with quickly and effectively .
there was minimal damage to the area and there were no injuries .

documents.title: electrical equipment sparks old trafford fire
text: a fire broke out in a lift motor room at manchester united 's old trafford stadium earlier .
the blaze broke out at about 07:00 in the ground 's south stand .
firefighters isolated the electrical supply and put out the flames .
there were no reports of any injuries .

documents.title: lorry chemical spill prompts m60 delays
text: flammable chemicals were spilled on to a section of the m60 following a collision between a tanker and a car , prompting severe delays .
author: Bolton News

documents.title: murder arrest after woman 's body found in moston house
text: a man has been arrested on sus of murder after the body of a 46-year-old woman was found at a house .
chrissy kendall was found dead at a property in kinver road , moston in manchester , at 13:00 on saturday .
det supt phil reade said : `` my thoughts are with chrissy 's family at this devastating time . ''
the results of post-mortem tests are expected later .
a 46-year-old man , who was arrested in failsworth , is in police custody for questioning .

documents.title: weather : cloudy and dry day
text: partly cloudy and a dry day for many , with some bright spells likely at times .
it will feel cool , with some patchy hill fog and drizzle over high ground .
highs of 7c .
more from bbc weather
author: BBC Weather

documents.title: good morning
text: hello and welcome to greater manchester live .
we 're here with all the latest news , sport , travel and weather from across the 10 boroughs and east cheshire .
to share news , tip-offs , photographs or anything else , you can contact the team via email , facebook or twitter .

Reporter, BBC News Online
